name: Pizza Pasta Bake
description: It's a saucy, cheesy mashup of your favourite pizza and pasta. Perfect for a fun family night in—easy to make and fun to eat! Include some of your family's fave pizza toppings at the dinner table; let them choose what to top their pasta with! Sliced black olives, diced bell peppers, mushrooms or even cooked, crumbled sausage.

ingredients.name: bite-size pasta
ingredients.additionalInstruction: such as penne or rotini, about 4 cups

preparation:
1. Preheat oven to 400° F. 
  2. In a large pot, cook pasta according to package directions. Reserve 1⁄2 cup pasta water, then drain. 
  3. Meanwhile, in Sauté Pan, combine cream cheese, mayo, and hot dip mix. Cover; cook over medium-low heat, stirring frequently, until warm, about 6–7 min. 
  4. Add warm pasta and 1⁄4 cup reserved pasta water to pan; stir until combined. Add more pasta water 1 tbsp at a time as needed. Top with cheese and pepperoni. 
  5. Transfer pan to oven. Bake 6–8 min, or until cheese is melted. Add toppings, if desired.
tips:
The Sauté Pan goes from stovetop to oven—if you don't have one, simply transfer the pasta and cream cheese mixture to an oven-proof dish, such as the Multipurpose Steamer. Top with pepperoni and cheese, then bake. 

Swap 2 tbsp Pizza Seasoning or Marinara Sauce Mix for Pizza Dip Hot Dip Mix.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 1 cup steamed broccoli or 2 cups spinach—choose higher protein veggies to bump up the protein.
